meanings.definition: A condition in which a person is excessively worried about having a serious illness.
meanings.sent1: Her hypochondriasis made her constantly fear she had a deadly disease.
meanings.sent2: His hypochondriasis often led him to seek multiple medical opinions for minor symptoms.
meanings.sent3: Despite being healthy, his hypochondriasis convinced him he was always on the brink of sickness.
meanings.sent4: Her hypochondriasis was like a dark cloud that overshadowed her every thought.
meanings.sent5: The hypochondriasis in his mind painted every ache as a sign of impending doom.

meanings.definition: The tendency to be overly concerned about one's health.
meanings.sent1: His hypochondriasis caused him to worry excessively about every little ache or pain.
meanings.sent2: She tried to manage her hypochondriasis by researching health topics online.
meanings.sent3: His hypochondriasis was so extreme that he carried a first aid kit everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The hypochondriasis in her family was like a contagious worry spreading to all.
meanings.sent5: The hypochondriasis in the community led to a surge in unnecessary doctor visits.
